Catalogues.description: List of databricks catalogues to create. Each catalogue will be created as a separate Terraform module. The catalog naming convention will be: {Org}_{Env}_{Confidentiality} (e.g., "myteam_dev_green") for standard catalogs or {Org}_{Env}_utils for the utils catalog. Fields: - Org: The organization or team name for the catalog - Env: The environment (e.g., dev, test, prod) - CatalogType: (Optional) Catalog type. Use "standard" (default) or "utils" for the shared utils catalog - Confidentiality: The data confidentiality level (e.g., green, yellow, red). Required unless CatalogType is "utils" - Comment: (Optional) A description for the catalog - ExtraSchemas: (Optional) List of additional schema names to create in the catalog - ExtraSchemasComment: (Optional) A comment for the extra schemas

TerraformVersion.description: The version of Terraform to use.
